body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gabriel Rodriguez and the customer's name is Virginia White.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Gabriel Rodriguez, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Gabriel, I'm Virginia White. I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Virginia. Buying a motorcycle can be a big decision! What specifically is causing you to feel overwhelmed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I just don’t know which model to choose. There are so many options!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That’s totally understandable! We have a wide range of models. Can I have your age, please? It will help me suggest something suitable.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I am thirty five years old.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And could you also tell me your budget range? Knowing this will help me narrow down the options for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was hoping to stay around seven thousand dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information. With your age and budget, I can recommend some excellent models that suit your needs and preferences.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds perfect! I appreciate your help, Gabriel.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Virginia! Thank you for your time today. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out to us at Phat Hogs. Have a great day!
